name: Change (itch) (NowiFate)
description:
This is a game I made for school.  It is a visual novel that follows the life of Marvin. A guy with a close group of friends. However, Marvin doesn't feel ready to come out with his secret: he is gay.  Along with Brandon, Sasha and Iker. You form your story in this new school. Some of the topics include: LGBTQ, non-binary, racism, micro agression.

Disclaimer: I'm not an artist. However, I did make the Art for this project.

Whole project made by and owned by NowiFate.
